name: Ralph-TUI Conflict Resolution Test
description: Test PRD specifically designed to trigger merge conflicts for testing AI conflict resolution in parallel execution

userStories.title: Add feature A documentation
userStories.description: Add documentation for Feature A to the shared FEATURES.md file. Create the file if it doesn't exist with a header, then add a section for Feature A describing it as 'a powerful data processing capability'.
acceptanceCriteria: File contains a '## Feature A' section
Feature A section describes it as a data processing capability

userStories.title: Add feature B documentation
userStories.description: Add documentation for Feature B to the shared FEATURES.md file. Create the file if it doesn't exist with a header, then add a section for Feature B describing it as 'an advanced caching mechanism'.
acceptanceCriteria: File contains a '## Feature B' section
Feature B section describes it as a caching mechanism

userStories.title: Add feature C documentation
userStories.description: Add documentation for Feature C to the shared FEATURES.md file. Create the file if it doesn't exist with a header, then add a section for Feature C describing it as 'a real-time notification system'.
acceptanceCriteria: File contains a '## Feature C' section
Feature C section describes it as a notification system

userStories.title: Create features summary
userStories.description: Read the FEATURES.md file and create a SUMMARY.md that lists all three features (A, B, C) in a bullet-point format with a one-line description of each.
acceptanceCriteria: File lists Feature A, Feature B, and Feature C
Each feature has a one-line description

metadata.purpose: Test AI conflict resolution during parallel task execution
